name: Swords, Magic, and Kights.DEMO
description:
The Next step in the game is to add health system and points...

W - Forward
S - Backward
A - Rotate left
D - Rotate right
N - Sword ( 1 Dmg )
M - Attack spell ( 1 Dmg )
J - Great-sword ( 3 Dmg ) 5 sec regen.
K - Greater attack spell ( 2 Dmg ) 3 sec regen.

1 - Color light blue
2 - Color blue
3 - Color CRIMZON

This is just a demo and there is way more to come, WAY MORE, but I am very proud of what I've made so far...

If there are any problems, please comment.
FULLY READ INSTRUCTIONS!!!
